paragraphs.content: Describify (“we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Describify. This Privacy Policy applies to our website and its associated subdomains (collectively, our “Service”) alongside our application, Describify. By accessing or using our Service, you signify that you have read, understood, and agree to our collection, storage, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.

paragraphs.title: Definitions and Key Terms
paragraphs.content:
To clarify terms used in this Privacy Policy:

- **Cookie**: A small amount of data generated by a website and saved by your web browser. Describify does not use cookies, nor does it use third-party cookies.

- **Company**: Refers to Describify, which is responsible for your information under this Privacy Policy.

- **Country**: Refers to Italy, where Describify and its owners are based.

- **Customer**: Refers to the entity or individual using Describify's Service.

- **Device**: Any internet-connected device, such as a phone, tablet, or computer, used to access Describify.

- **IP address**: A unique number assigned to each internet-connected device, often used to identify the geographical area of connection.

- **Personal Data**: Any information that allows for the identification or identifiability of an individual.

- **Service**: The service provided by Describify as described on the platform.

- **Website**: Describify's site, accessible at https://www.describify.it.

paragraphs.title: Information Automatically Collected
paragraphs.content: Describify uses LogLib to collect analytics data on website traffic (e.g., user geography, visit frequency). However, Describify does not store cookies on user devices, nor does LogLib use third-party cookies. This information is collected for analytics purposes to improve platform performance and security.

paragraphs.title: Your Consent
paragraphs.content: By using our website, registering an account, or making a purchase, you consent to this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

paragraphs.title: Changes To Our Privacy Policy
paragraphs.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Changes will be posted, and continued use of Describify implies acceptance of the updated terms.

paragraphs.title: Contact Us
paragraphs.content: For questions about our Privacy Policy, contact us at info@describify.it.
